mapper.select:
SELECT '' AS SL_RCOG_DT --매출인식일자 ,'' AS SELL_TP_CD --판매유형 ,'' AS SELL_TP_DTL_CD --판매유형상세코드 ,'' AS PD_CD ,'' AS PD_NM ,'' AS SAP_PD_DV_CD ,'' AS SAP_PD_DV_NM --SAP구분코드명 ,TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(T1.SELL_QTY,0)), 'FM999,999,999,999,990') AS SELL_QTY --판매수량-정상매출
,TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0))+SUM(NVL(T1.PVDA_AMT,0)), 'FM999,999,999,999,990') AS SELL_AMT --매출금액-정상매출 ,TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0))+SUM(NVL(T1.PVDA_AMT,0)), 'FM999,999,999,999,990') AS SELL_SPL_AMT --공급가액-정상매출
,TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0)), 'FM999,999,999,999,990') AS SELL_AMT --매출금액-정상매출 ,TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0))-SUM(NVL(T1.SL_SUM_VAT,0)), 'FM999,999,999,999,990') AS SELL_SPL_AMT --공급가액-정상매출
,TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(T1.SL_SUM_VAT,0)), 'FM999,999,999,999,990') AS SELL_AMT_VAT --부가세-정상매출 ,TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(T1.PVDA_AMT,0)), 'FM999,999,999,999,990') AS PVDA_AMT --현할차-정상매출 ,TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(T1.CH_QTY,0)), 'FM999,999,999,999,990') AS CH_QTY --판매수량-매출변경 ,TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(T1.SL_CH_AMT,0)), 'FM999,999,999,999,990') AS SL_CH_AMT --매출금액-매출변경 ,TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(T1.SL_CH_AMT,0)) - SUM(NVL(T1.CH_VAT,0)), 'FM999,999,999,999,990') AS CH_SPL_AMT --공급가액-매출변경 ,TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(T1.CH_VAT,0)), 'FM999,999,999,999,990') AS CH_VAT --부가세-매출변경 ,TO_CHAR(SUM(DECODE(NVL(T1.SL_CH_AMT,0),0,0,T1.PVDA_AMT)), 'FM999,999,999,999,990') AS CH_PVDA_AMT --현할차-매출변경 ,TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(T1.CAN_QTY,0)), 'FM999,999,999,999,990') AS CAN_QTY --판매수량-매출취소 ,TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(T1.SL_CAN_AMT,0)), 'FM999,999,999,999,990') AS SL_CAN_AMT --매출금액-매출취소 ,TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(T1.SL_CAN_AMT,0)) - SUM(NVL(T1.CAN_VAT,0)), 'FM999,999,999,999,990') AS CAN_SPL_AMT --공급가액-매출취소 ,TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(T1.CAN_VAT,0)), 'FM999,999,999,999,990') AS CAN_VAT --부가세-매출취소 ,TO_CHAR(SUM(DECODE(NVL(T1.SL_CAN_AMT,0),0,0,T1.PVDA_AMT)), 'FM999,999,999,999,990') AS CAN_PVDA_AMT --현할차-매출취소 ,TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(T1.SELL_QTY,0)) + SUM(NVL(T1.CH_QTY,0)) - SUM(NVL(T1.CAN_QTY,0)), 'FM999,999,999,999,990') AS TOT_QTY--판매수량-매출합계
,TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0))+SUM(NVL(T1.PVDA_AMT,0)), 'FM999,999,999,999,990') AS TOT_AMT--매출금액-매출합계 ,TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0))+SUM(NVL(T1.PVDA_AMT,0)), 'FM999,999,999,999,990') AS TOT_SPL_AMT--공급가액-매출합계
,TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0)) + SUM(NVL(T1.SL_CH_AMT,0)) - SUM(NVL(T1.SL_CAN_AMT,0)), 'FM999,999,999,999,990') AS TOT_AMT--매출금액-매출합계 ,TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0)) + SUM(NVL(T1.SL_CH_AMT,0)) - SUM(NVL(T1.SL_CAN_AMT,0)) - SUM(NVL(T1.SL_SUM_VAT,0)) + SUM(NVL(T1.CH_VAT,0)) - SUM(NVL(T1.CAN_VAT,0)), 'FM999,999,999,999,990') AS TOT_SPL_AMT--공급가액-매출합계
,TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(T1.SL_SUM_VAT,0)) + SUM(NVL(T1.CH_VAT,0)) - SUM(NVL(T1.CAN_VAT,0)), 'FM999,999,999,999,990') AS TOT_VAT --부가세-매출합계 ,TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(T1.PVDA_AMT,0)) + SUM(DECODE(NVL(T1.SL_CH_AMT,0),0,0,T1.PVDA_AMT)) - SUM(DECODE(NVL(T1.SL_CAN_AMT,0),0,0,T1.PVDA_AMT)), 'FM999,999,999,999,990') AS TOT_PVDA_AMT --현할차-매출합계 FROM TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_MM_CL_IZ T1 INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T2 ON T1.PD_CD = T2.PD_CD /*원두제외*/ LEFT JOIN (SELECT SA.CNTR_NO, SA.CNTR_SN, B.PD_CD, B.PD_NM, C.REF_PD_CLSF_VAL FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_PD_REL SA /*계약상품관계*/ ,TB_PDBS_PD_BAS B /*상품기본*/ ,TB_PDBS_PD_CLSF_BAS C /*상품분류기본*/ WHERE SA.BASE_PD_CD = B.PD_CD AND B.PD_CLSF_ID = C.PD_CLSF_ID AND C.REF_PD_CLSF_VAL IN ('05003002','0A003002') /*참조상품분류값 = 상품대분류2자리||상품중분류3자리||상품소분류3자리||상품세분류3자리*/ ) T10 ON T1.CNTR_NO = T10.CNTR_NO AND T1.CNTR_SN = T10.CNTR_SN WHERE T1.SL_RCOG_DT BETWEEN #{baseDtFrom} AND #{baseDtTo} AND T10.CNTR_NO IS NULL AND T10.CNTR_SN IS NULL AND T1.SELL_TP_CD = DECODE(#{sellTpCd}, '10', '2', #{sellTpCd})
AND T1.SELL_TP_DTL_CD = #{sellTpDtlCd}
AND T1.SELL_TP_DTL_CD IN ('22','24','25','26')
AND SUBSTR(SL_RCOG_DT,1,6) = T1.SL_CL_YM
AND T1.SELL_INFLW_CHNL_DTL_CD = #{sellChnlDvCd} /*판매채널*/
AND T1.SAP_PD_DV_CD = #{sapPdDvCd} --SAP상품구분코드

SELECT T1.SL_RCOG_DT AS SL_RCOG_DT --매출인식일자 ,1 AS SEQ ,F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'SELL_TP_CD', T1.SELL_TP_CD) AS SELL_TP_CD --판매유형 ,F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'SELL_TP_DTL_CD', T1.SELL_TP_DTL_CD) AS SELL_TP_DTL_CD --판매유형상세코드
,'' AS PD_CD ,'' AS PD_NM
,T1.PD_CD --상품코드 ,T2.PD_NM --상품명
,T1.SAP_PD_DV_CD ,(SELECT SAP_PD_DV_NM AS CODE_NAME /*SAP상품항목코드*/ FROM TB_CBCL_SAP_PD_DV_CD WHERE SAP_BZ_TERY_CD = '1210' /*에듀는 1110, 웰스는 1210*/ AND SAP_PD_ATC_CD = '00' /*상품항목 00 - SAP상품코드인건, 01부터는 SAP항목코드*/ AND SAP_PD_DV_CD = T1.SAP_PD_DV_CD GROUP BY SAP_PD_DV_CD, SAP_PD_DV_NM ) AS SAP_PD_DV_NM --SAP구분코드명 ,SUM(NVL(T1.SELL_QTY,0)) AS SELL_QTY --판매수량-정상매출 ,DECODE(T1.SELL_TP_CD ,'2',SUM(NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0))+SUM(NVL(T1.PVDA_AMT,0)), SUM(NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0))) AS SELL_AMT --매출금액-정상매출 ,DECODE(T1.SELL_TP_CD ,'2',SUM(NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0))+SUM(NVL(T1.PVDA_AMT,0)), SUM(NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0)))-SUM(NVL(T1.SL_SUM_VAT,0)) AS SELL_SPL_AMT --공급가액-정상매출 ,SUM(NVL(T1.SL_SUM_VAT,0)) AS SELL_AMT_VAT --부가세-정상매출 ,SUM(NVL(T1.PVDA_AMT,0)) AS PVDA_AMT --현할차-정상매출 ,SUM(NVL(T1.CH_QTY,0)) AS CH_QTY --판매수량-매출변경 ,SUM(NVL(T1.SL_CH_AMT,0)) AS SL_CH_AMT --매출금액-매출변경 ,SUM(NVL(T1.SL_CH_AMT,0)) - SUM(NVL(T1.CH_VAT,0)) AS CH_SPL_AMT --공급가액-매출변경 ,SUM(NVL(T1.CH_VAT,0)) AS CH_VAT --부가세-매출변경 ,SUM(DECODE(NVL(T1.SL_CH_AMT,0),0,0,T1.PVDA_AMT)) AS CH_PVDA_AMT --현할차-매출변경 ,SUM(NVL(T1.CAN_QTY,0)) AS CAN_QTY --판매수량-매출취소 ,SUM(NVL(T1.SL_CAN_AMT,0)) AS SL_CAN_AMT --매출금액-매출취소 ,SUM(NVL(T1.SL_CAN_AMT,0)) - SUM(NVL(T1.CAN_VAT,0)) AS CAN_SPL_AMT --공급가액-매출취소 ,SUM(NVL(T1.CAN_VAT,0)) AS CAN_VAT --부가세-매출취소 ,SUM(DECODE(NVL(T1.SL_CAN_AMT,0),0,0,T1.PVDA_AMT)) AS CAN_PVDA_AMT --현할차-매출취소 ,SUM(NVL(T1.SELL_QTY,0)) + SUM(NVL(T1.CH_QTY,0)) - SUM(NVL(T1.CAN_QTY,0)) AS TOT_QTY--판매수량-매출합계 ,DECODE(T1.SELL_TP_CD ,'2',SUM(NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0))+SUM(NVL(T1.PVDA_AMT,0)), SUM(NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0))) + SUM(NVL(T1.SL_CH_AMT,0)) - SUM(NVL(T1.SL_CAN_AMT,0)) AS TOT_AMT--매출금액-매출합계 ,(DECODE(T1.SELL_TP_CD ,'2',SUM(NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0))+SUM(NVL(T1.PVDA_AMT,0)), SUM(NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0))) + SUM(NVL(T1.SL_CH_AMT,0)) - SUM(NVL(T1.SL_CAN_AMT,0))) - (SUM(NVL(T1.SL_SUM_VAT,0)) + SUM(NVL(T1.CH_VAT,0))- SUM(NVL(T1.CAN_VAT,0))) AS TOT_SPL_AMT--공급가액-매출합계 ,SUM(NVL(T1.SL_SUM_VAT,0)) + SUM(NVL(T1.CH_VAT,0)) - SUM(NVL(T1.CAN_VAT,0)) AS TOT_VAT --부가세-매출합계 ,SUM(NVL(T1.PVDA_AMT,0)) + SUM(DECODE(NVL(T1.SL_CH_AMT,0),0,0,T1.PVDA_AMT)) - SUM(DECODE(NVL(T1.SL_CAN_AMT,0),0,0,T1.PVDA_AMT)) AS TOT_PVDA_AMT --현할차-매출합계 FROM TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_MM_CL_IZ T1 INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T2 ON T1.PD_CD = T2.PD_CD /*원두제외*/ LEFT JOIN (SELECT SA.CNTR_NO, SA.CNTR_SN, B.PD_CD, B.PD_NM, C.REF_PD_CLSF_VAL FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_PD_REL SA /*계약상품관계*/ ,TB_PDBS_PD_BAS B /*상품기본*/ ,TB_PDBS_PD_CLSF_BAS C /*상품분류기본*/ WHERE SA.BASE_PD_CD = B.PD_CD AND B.PD_CLSF_ID = C.PD_CLSF_ID AND C.REF_PD_CLSF_VAL IN ('05003002','0A003002') /*참조상품분류값 = 상품대분류2자리||상품중분류3자리||상품소분류3자리||상품세분류3자리*/ ) T10 ON T1.CNTR_NO = T10.CNTR_NO AND T1.CNTR_SN = T10.CNTR_SN WHERE T1.SL_RCOG_DT BETWEEN #{baseDtFrom} AND #{baseDtTo} AND T10.CNTR_NO IS NULL AND T10.CNTR_SN IS NULL AND T1.SELL_TP_CD = DECODE(#{sellTpCd}, '10', '2', #{sellTpCd})
AND T1.SELL_TP_DTL_CD = #{sellTpDtlCd}
AND T1.SELL_TP_DTL_CD IN ('22','24','25','26')
AND SUBSTR(SL_RCOG_DT,1,6) = T1.SL_CL_YM
AND T1.SELL_INFLW_CHNL_DTL_CD = #{sellChnlDvCd} /*판매채널*/
AND T1.SAP_PD_DV_CD = #{sapPdDvCd} --SAP상품구분코드
GROUP BY T1.SL_RCOG_DT, T1.SELL_TP_CD, T1.SELL_TP_DTL_CD,
T1.PD_CD, T2.PD_NM,
T1.SAP_PD_DV_CD
UNION ALL SELECT DECODE(T1.SL_RCOG_DT,NULL,'합계',T1.SL_RCOG_DT) AS SL_RCOG_DT --매출인식일자 ,1 AS SEQ ,F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'SELL_TP_CD', T1.SELL_TP_CD) AS SELL_TP_CD --판매유형 ,F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'SELL_TP_DTL_CD', T1.SELL_TP_DTL_CD) AS SELL_TP_DTL_CD --판매유형상세코드
,'' AS PD_CD ,'' AS PD_NM
,T1.PD_CD --상품코드 ,T2.PD_NM --상품명
,T1.SAP_PD_DV_CD ,(SELECT SAP_PD_DV_NM AS CODE_NAME /*SAP상품항목코드*/ FROM TB_CBCL_SAP_PD_DV_CD WHERE SAP_BZ_TERY_CD = '1210' /*에듀는 1110, 웰스는 1210*/ AND SAP_PD_ATC_CD = '00' /*상품항목 00 - SAP상품코드인건, 01부터는 SAP항목코드*/ AND SAP_PD_DV_CD = T1.SAP_PD_DV_CD GROUP BY SAP_PD_DV_CD, SAP_PD_DV_NM) AS SAP_PD_DV_NM --SAP구분코드명 ,SUM(NVL(T1.SELL_QTY,0)) AS SELL_QTY --판매수량-정상매출 ,SUM(NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0)) AS SELL_AMT --매출금액-정상매출 ,SUM(NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0))-SUM(NVL(T1.SL_SUM_VAT,0)) AS SELL_SPL_AMT --공급가액-정상매출 ,SUM(NVL(T1.SL_SUM_VAT,0)) AS SELL_AMT_VAT --부가세-정상매출 ,SUM(NVL(T1.PVDA_AMT,0)) AS PVDA_AMT --현할차-정상매출 ,SUM(NVL(T1.CH_QTY,0)) AS CH_QTY --판매수량-매출변경 ,SUM(NVL(T1.SL_CH_AMT,0)) AS SL_CH_AMT --매출금액-매출변경 ,SUM(NVL(T1.SL_CH_AMT,0)) - SUM(NVL(T1.CH_VAT,0)) AS CH_SPL_AMT --공급가액-매출변경 ,SUM(NVL(T1.CH_VAT,0)) AS CH_VAT --부가세-매출변경 ,SUM(DECODE(NVL(T1.SL_CH_AMT,0),0,0,T1.PVDA_AMT)) AS CH_PVDA_AMT --현할차-매출변경 ,SUM(NVL(T1.CAN_QTY,0)) AS CAN_QTY --판매수량-매출취소 ,SUM(NVL(T1.SL_CAN_AMT,0)) AS SL_CAN_AMT --매출금액-매출취소 ,SUM(NVL(T1.SL_CAN_AMT,0)) - SUM(NVL(T1.CAN_VAT,0)) AS CAN_SPL_AMT --공급가액-매출취소 ,SUM(NVL(T1.CAN_VAT,0)) AS CAN_VAT --부가세-매출취소 ,SUM(DECODE(NVL(T1.SL_CAN_AMT,0),0,0,T1.PVDA_AMT)) AS CAN_PVDA_AMT --현할차-매출취소 ,SUM(NVL(T1.SELL_QTY,0)) + SUM(NVL(T1.CH_QTY,0)) - SUM(NVL(T1.CAN_QTY,0)) AS TOT_QTY--판매수량-매출합계 ,SUM(NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0)) + SUM(NVL(T1.SL_CH_AMT,0)) - SUM(NVL(T1.SL_CAN_AMT,0)) AS TOT_AMT--매출금액-매출합계 ,SUM(NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0)) + SUM(NVL(T1.SL_CH_AMT,0)) - SUM(NVL(T1.SL_CAN_AMT,0)) - (SUM(NVL(T1.SL_SUM_VAT,0)) + SUM(NVL(T1.CH_VAT,0))- SUM(NVL(T1.CAN_VAT,0))) AS TOT_SPL_AMT--공급가액-매출합계 ,SUM(NVL(T1.SL_SUM_VAT,0)) + SUM(NVL(T1.CH_VAT,0)) - SUM(NVL(T1.CAN_VAT,0)) AS TOT_VAT --부가세-매출합계 ,SUM(NVL(T1.PVDA_AMT,0)) + SUM(DECODE(NVL(T1.SL_CH_AMT,0),0,0,T1.PVDA_AMT)) - SUM(DECODE(NVL(T1.SL_CAN_AMT,0),0,0,T1.PVDA_AMT)) AS TOT_PVDA_AMT --현할차-매출합계 FROM TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_MM_CL_IZ T1 INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T2 ON T1.PD_CD = T2.PD_CD LEFT JOIN (SELECT SA.CNTR_NO, SA.CNTR_SN FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_PD_REL SA /*계약상품관계*/ ,TB_PDBS_PD_BAS B /*상품기본*/ ,TB_PDBS_PD_CLSF_BAS C /*상품분류기본*/ WHERE SA.BASE_PD_CD = B.PD_CD AND B.PD_CLSF_ID = C.PD_CLSF_ID AND C.REF_PD_CLSF_VAL IN ('05003002','0A003002') /*참조상품분류값 = 상품대분류2자리||상품중분류3자리||상품소분류3자리||상품세분류3자리*/ GROUP BY SA.CNTR_NO, SA.CNTR_SN )T10 ON T1.CNTR_NO = T10.CNTR_NO AND T1.CNTR_SN = T10.CNTR_SN WHERE T1.SL_RCOG_DT BETWEEN #{baseDtFrom} AND #{baseDtTo} AND T10.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T10.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND T1.SELL_TP_CD = DECODE(#{sellTpCd}, '10', '2', #{sellTpCd}) AND SUBSTR(SL_RCOG_DT,1,6) = T1.SL_CL_YM
AND T1.SELL_INFLW_CHNL_DTL_CD = #{sellChnlDvCd} /*판매채널*/
AND T1.SAP_PD_DV_CD = #{sapPdDvCd} --SAP상품구분코드
GROUP BY T1.SL_RCOG_DT, T1.SELL_TP_CD, T1.SELL_TP_DTL_CD,
T1.PD_CD, T2.PD_NM,
T1.SAP_PD_DV_CD
UNION ALL SELECT '' AS SL_RCOG_DT --법인구분 ,2 AS SEQ ,NAME AS SELL_TP_CD --판매유형 ,'' AS SELL_TP_DTL_CD --판매유형상세코드 ,'' AS PD_CD --상품코드 ,'' AS PD_NM --상품명 ,'' AS SAP_PD_DV_CD ,'' AS SAP_PD_DV_NM ,NULL AS SELL_QTY --판매수량-정상매출 ,NULL AS SELL_AMT --매출금액-정상매출 ,NULL AS SELL_SPL_AMT --공급가액-정상매출 ,NULL AS SELL_AMT_VAT --부가세-정상매출 ,NULL AS PVDA_AMT --현할차-정상매출 ,NULL AS CH_QTY --판매수량-매출변경 ,NULL AS SL_CH_AMT --매출금액-매출변경 ,NULL AS CH_SPL_AMT--공급가액-매출변경 ,NULL AS CH_VAT --부가세-매출변경 ,NULL AS CH_PVDA_AMT --현할차-매출변경 ,NULL AS CAN_QTY --판매수량-매출취소 ,NULL AS SL_CAN_AMT --매출금액-매출취소 ,NULL AS CAN_SPL_AMT--공급가액-매출취소 ,NULL AS CAN_VAT --부가세-매출취소 ,NULL AS CAN_PVDA_AMT --현할차-매출취소 ,NULL AS TOT_QTY --판매수량-매출합계 ,SUM(VALUE1) AS TOT_AMT--매출금액-매출합계 ,SUM(VALUE2) AS TOT_SPL_AMT --공급가액-매출합계 ,SUM(VALUE3) AS TOT_VAT --부가세-매출합계 ,NULL AS TOT_PVDA_AMT --현할차-매출합계 FROM ( SELECT SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(SAP_MAT_EVL_CLSS_VAL,1,2),'Z1',DECODE(T1.SELL_TP_CD ,'2',NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0)+NVL(T1.PVDA_AMT,0), NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0))+NVL(T1.SL_CH_AMT,0)-NVL(T1.SL_CAN_AMT,0),0)) AS PRDT1 --제품(매출금액) ,SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(SAP_MAT_EVL_CLSS_VAL,1,2),'Z1',DECODE(T1.SELL_TP_CD ,'2',NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0)+NVL(T1.PVDA_AMT,0), NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0))-NVL(T1.SL_SUM_VAT,0)+NVL(T1.SL_CH_AMT,0)-NVL(T1.CH_VAT,0)-(NVL(T1.SL_CAN_AMT,0)-NVL(T1.CAN_VAT,0)))) AS PRDT2 --제품(공급가액) ,SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(SAP_MAT_EVL_CLSS_VAL,1,2),'Z1',NVL(T1.SL_SUM_VAT,0)+NVL(T1.CH_VAT,0)-NVL(T1.CAN_VAT,0))) AS PRDT3 --제품(부가세) ,SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(SAP_MAT_EVL_CLSS_VAL,1,2),'Z2',DECODE(T1.SELL_TP_CD ,'2',NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0)+NVL(T1.PVDA_AMT,0), NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0))+NVL(T1.SL_CH_AMT,0)-NVL(T1.SL_CAN_AMT,0),0)) AS PRDT5 --상품(매출금액) ,SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(SAP_MAT_EVL_CLSS_VAL,1,2),'Z2',DECODE(T1.SELL_TP_CD ,'2',NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0)+NVL(T1.PVDA_AMT,0), NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0))-NVL(T1.SL_SUM_VAT,0)+NVL(T1.SL_CH_AMT,0)-NVL(T1.CH_VAT,0)-(NVL(T1.SL_CAN_AMT,0)-NVL(T1.CAN_VAT,0)))) AS PRDT6 --상품(공급가액) ,SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(SAP_MAT_EVL_CLSS_VAL,1,2),'Z2',NVL(T1.SL_SUM_VAT,0)+NVL(T1.CH_VAT,0)-NVL(T1.CAN_VAT,0))) AS PRDT7 --상품(부가세) ,SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(SAP_MAT_EVL_CLSS_VAL,1,2),'Z7',DECODE(T1.SELL_TP_CD ,'2',NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0)+NVL(T1.PVDA_AMT,0), NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0))+NVL(T1.SL_CH_AMT,0)-NVL(T1.SL_CAN_AMT,0),0)) AS PRDT9 --저장품(매출금액) ,SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(SAP_MAT_EVL_CLSS_VAL,1,2),'Z7',DECODE(T1.SELL_TP_CD ,'2',NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0)+NVL(T1.PVDA_AMT,0), NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0))-NVL(T1.SL_SUM_VAT,0)+NVL(T1.SL_CH_AMT,0)-NVL(T1.CH_VAT,0)-(NVL(T1.SL_CAN_AMT,0)-NVL(T1.CAN_VAT,0)))) AS PRDT10 --저장품(공급가액) ,SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(SAP_MAT_EVL_CLSS_VAL,1,2),'Z7',NVL(T1.SL_SUM_VAT,0)+NVL(T1.CH_VAT,0)-NVL(T1.CAN_VAT,0))) AS PRDT11 --저장품(부가세) FROM TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_MM_CL_IZ T1 INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T2 ON T1.PD_CD = T2.PD_CD /*원두제외*/ LEFT JOIN (SELECT SA.CNTR_NO, SA.CNTR_SN, B.PD_CD, B.PD_NM, C.REF_PD_CLSF_VAL FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_PD_REL SA /*계약상품관계*/ , TB_PDBS_PD_BAS B /*상품기본*/ , TB_PDBS_PD_CLSF_BAS C /*상품분류기본*/ WHERE SA.BASE_PD_CD = B.PD_CD AND B.PD_CLSF_ID = C.PD_CLSF_ID AND C.REF_PD_CLSF_VAL IN ('05003002','0A003002') /*참조상품분류값 = 상품대분류2자리||상품중분류3자리||상품소분류3자리||상품세분류3자리*/ ) T10 ON T1.CNTR_NO = T10.CNTR_NO AND T1.CNTR_SN = T10.CNTR_SN WHERE T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T10.CNTR_NO IS NULL AND T10.CNTR_SN IS NULL AND T1.SL_RCOG_DT BETWEEN #{baseDtFrom} AND #{baseDtTo} AND T1.SELL_TP_CD = DECODE(#{sellTpCd}, '10', '2', #{sellTpCd})
AND T1.SELL_TP_DTL_CD = #{sellTpDtlCd}
AND T1.SELL_TP_DTL_CD IN ('22','24','25','26')
AND SUBSTR(SL_RCOG_DT,1,6) = T1.SL_CL_YM
AND T1.SELL_INFLW_CHNL_DTL_CD = #{sellChnlDvCd} /*판매채널*/
AND T1.SAP_PD_DV_CD = #{sapPdDvCd} --SAP상품구분코드
UNION ALL SELECT SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(SAP_MAT_EVL_CLSS_VAL,1,2),'Z1',DECODE(T1.SELL_TP_CD ,'2',NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0)+NVL(T1.PVDA_AMT,0), NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0))+NVL(T1.SL_CH_AMT,0)-NVL(T1.SL_CAN_AMT,0),0)) AS PRDT1 --제품(매출금액) ,SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(SAP_MAT_EVL_CLSS_VAL,1,2),'Z1',DECODE(T1.SELL_TP_CD ,'2',NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0)+NVL(T1.PVDA_AMT,0), NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0))-NVL(T1.SL_SUM_VAT,0)+NVL(T1.SL_CH_AMT,0)-NVL(T1.CH_VAT,0)-(NVL(T1.SL_CAN_AMT,0)-NVL(T1.CAN_VAT,0)))) AS PRDT2 --제품(공급가액) ,SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(SAP_MAT_EVL_CLSS_VAL,1,2),'Z1',NVL(T1.SL_SUM_VAT,0)+NVL(T1.CH_VAT,0)-NVL(T1.CAN_VAT,0))) AS PRDT3 --제품(부가세) ,SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(SAP_MAT_EVL_CLSS_VAL,1,2),'Z2',DECODE(T1.SELL_TP_CD ,'2',NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0)+NVL(T1.PVDA_AMT,0), NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0))+NVL(T1.SL_CH_AMT,0)-NVL(T1.SL_CAN_AMT,0),0)) AS PRDT5 --상품(매출금액) ,SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(SAP_MAT_EVL_CLSS_VAL,1,2),'Z2',DECODE(T1.SELL_TP_CD ,'2',NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0)+NVL(T1.PVDA_AMT,0), NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0))-NVL(T1.SL_SUM_VAT,0)+NVL(T1.SL_CH_AMT,0)-NVL(T1.CH_VAT,0)-(NVL(T1.SL_CAN_AMT,0)-NVL(T1.CAN_VAT,0)))) AS PRDT6 --상품(공급가액) ,SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(SAP_MAT_EVL_CLSS_VAL,1,2),'Z2',NVL(T1.SL_SUM_VAT,0)+NVL(T1.CH_VAT,0)-NVL(T1.CAN_VAT,0))) AS PRDT7 --상품(부가세) ,SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(SAP_MAT_EVL_CLSS_VAL,1,2),'Z7',DECODE(T1.SELL_TP_CD ,'2',NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0)+NVL(T1.PVDA_AMT,0), NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0))+NVL(T1.SL_CH_AMT,0)-NVL(T1.SL_CAN_AMT,0),0)) AS PRDT9 --저장품(매출금액) ,SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(SAP_MAT_EVL_CLSS_VAL,1,2),'Z7',DECODE(T1.SELL_TP_CD ,'2',NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0)+NVL(T1.PVDA_AMT,0), NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0))-NVL(T1.SL_SUM_VAT,0)+NVL(T1.SL_CH_AMT,0)-NVL(T1.CH_VAT,0)-(NVL(T1.SL_CAN_AMT,0)-NVL(T1.CAN_VAT,0)))) AS PRDT10 --저장품(공급가액) ,SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(SAP_MAT_EVL_CLSS_VAL,1,2),'Z7',NVL(T1.SL_SUM_VAT,0)+NVL(T1.CH_VAT,0)-NVL(T1.CAN_VAT,0))) AS PRDT11 --저장품(부가세) FROM TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_MM_CL_IZ T1 INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T2 ON T1.PD_CD = T2.PD_CD LEFT JOIN (SELECT SA.CNTR_NO, SA.CNTR_SN FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_PD_REL SA /*계약상품관계*/ ,TB_PDBS_PD_BAS B /*상품기본*/ ,TB_PDBS_PD_CLSF_BAS C /*상품분류기본*/ WHERE SA.BASE_PD_CD = B.PD_CD AND B.PD_CLSF_ID = C.PD_CLSF_ID AND C.REF_PD_CLSF_VAL IN ('05003002','0A003002') /*참조상품분류값 = 상품대분류2자리||상품중분류3자리||상품소분류3자리||상품세분류3자리*/ GROUP BY SA.CNTR_NO, SA.CNTR_SN )T10 ON T1.CNTR_NO = T10.CNTR_NO AND T1.CNTR_SN = T10.CNTR_SN WHERE T1.SL_RCOG_DT BETWEEN #{baseDtFrom} AND #{baseDtTo} AND T10.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T10.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND T1.SELL_TP_CD = DECODE(#{sellTpCd}, '10', '2', #{sellTpCd}) AND SUBSTR(SL_RCOG_DT,1,6) = T1.SL_CL_YM
AND T1.SELL_INFLW_CHNL_DTL_CD = #{sellChnlDvCd} /*판매채널*/
AND T1.SAP_PD_DV_CD = #{sapPdDvCd} --SAP상품구분코드
) UNPIVOT ( (VALUE1,VALUE2,VALUE3) FOR NAME IN ( (PRDT1,PRDT2,PRDT3) AS '제품', (PRDT5,PRDT6,PRDT7) AS '상품', (PRDT9,PRDT10,PRDT11) AS '저장품' ) ) GROUP BY NAME ORDER BY 2

SELECT '' AS SL_RCOG_DT --매출인식일자 ,'' AS SELL_TP_CD --판매유형 ,'' AS SELL_TP_DTL_CD --판매유형상세코드 ,'' AS PD_CD ,'' AS PD_NM ,'' AS SAP_PD_DV_CD ,'' AS SAP_PD_DV_NM --SAP구분코드명 ,TO_CHAR(SUM(DECODE(T1.RENTAL_TN,0,NVL(T1.CNTR_AMT,0),0)), 'FM999,999,999,999,990') AS RENTAL_RGST_COST --매출금액-등록비 ,TO_CHAR(SUM(DECODE(T1.RENTAL_TN,0,NVL(T1.CNTR_AMT,0) - NVL(T1.RENTAL_RGST_COST_VAT,0),0)), 'FM999,999,999,999,990') AS RENTAL_RGST_COST_SPL --공급가액-등록비 ,TO_CHAR(SUM(DECODE(T1.RENTAL_TN,0,NVL(T1.RENTAL_RGST_COST_VAT,0),0)), 'FM999,999,999,999,990') AS RENTAL_RGST_COST_VAT --부가세-등록비 ,TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0)), 'FM999,999,999,999,990') AS NOM_SL_AMT --매출금액-렌탈료 ,TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0)) - SUM(NVL(T1.SL_SUM_VAT,0)), 'FM999,999,999,999,990') AS SPL_AMT --공급가액-렌탈료 ,TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(T1.SL_SUM_VAT,0)), 'FM999,999,999,999,990') AS VAT --부가세-렌탈료 ,TO_CHAR(SUM(DECODE(T1.RENTAL_TN,0,NVL(T1.CNTR_AMT,0),0)) + SUM(NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0)), 'FM999,999,999,999,990') AS TOT_SL_AMT --매출금액-매출합계 ,TO_CHAR((SUM(DECODE(T1.RENTAL_TN,0,NVL(T1.CNTR_AMT,0) - NVL(T1.RENTAL_RGST_COST_VAT,0),0))) + (SUM(NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0)) - SUM(NVL(T1.SL_SUM_VAT,0))), 'FM999,999,999,999,990') AS TOT_SPL --공급가액-매출합계 ,TO_CHAR(SUM(DECODE(T1.RENTAL_TN,0,NVL(T1.RENTAL_RGST_COST_VAT,0),0)) + SUM(NVL(T1.SL_SUM_VAT,0)), 'FM999,999,999,999,990') AS TOT_VAT --부가세-매출합계 FROM TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_MM_CL_IZ T1 INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T2 ON T1.PD_CD = T2.PD_CD /*원두제외*/ LEFT JOIN (SELECT /*+ USE_NL(SA B C) */ SA.CNTR_NO, SA.CNTR_SN, B.PD_CD, B.PD_NM, C.REF_PD_CLSF_VAL FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_PD_REL SA /*계약상품관계*/ , TB_PDBS_PD_BAS B /*상품기본*/ , TB_PDBS_PD_CLSF_BAS C /*상품분류기본*/ WHERE SA.BASE_PD_CD = B.PD_CD AND B.PD_CLSF_ID = C.PD_CLSF_ID AND C.REF_PD_CLSF_VAL IN ('05003002','0A003002') /*참조상품분류값 = 상품대분류2자리||상품중분류3자리||상품소분류3자리||상품세분류3자리*/ ) T7 ON T7.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T7.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN WHERE T1.SL_RCOG_DT BETWEEN #{baseDtFrom} AND #{baseDtTo} AND T1.SELL_TP_CD = #{sellTpCd}
AND T1.SELL_TP_DTL_CD = #{sellTpDtlCd}
AND T1.SELL_TP_DTL_CD IN ('21','23')
AND SUBSTR(SL_RCOG_DT,1,6) = T1.SL_CL_YM
AND T1.SELL_INFLW_CHNL_DTL_CD = #{sellChnlDvCd} /*판매채널*/
AND T1.SAP_PD_DV_CD = #{sapPdDvCd} --SAP상품구분코드
AND T7.CNTR_NO IS NULL AND T7.CNTR_SN IS NULL

SELECT T1.SL_RCOG_DT AS SL_RCOG_DT --매출인식일자 ,F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'SELL_TP_CD', T1.SELL_TP_CD) AS SELL_TP_CD --판매유형 ,F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'SELL_TP_DTL_CD', T1.SELL_TP_DTL_CD) AS SELL_TP_DTL_CD --판매유형상세코드
,'' AS PD_CD ,'' AS PD_NM
,T1.PD_CD --상품코드 ,T2.PD_NM --상품명
,T1.SAP_PD_DV_CD ,(SELECT SAP_PD_DV_NM AS CODE_NAME /*SAP상품항목코드*/ FROM TB_CBCL_SAP_PD_DV_CD WHERE SAP_BZ_TERY_CD = '1210' /*에듀는 1110, 웰스는 1210*/ AND SAP_PD_ATC_CD = '00' /*상품항목 00 - SAP상품코드인건, 01부터는 SAP항목코드*/ AND SAP_PD_DV_CD = T1.SAP_PD_DV_CD GROUP BY SAP_PD_DV_CD, SAP_PD_DV_NM) AS SAP_PD_DV_NM --SAP구분코드명 ,SUM(DECODE(T1.RENTAL_TN,0,NVL(T1.CNTR_AMT,0),0)) AS RENTAL_RGST_COST --매출금액-등록비 ,SUM(DECODE(T1.RENTAL_TN,0,NVL(T1.CNTR_AMT,0) - NVL(T1.RENTAL_RGST_COST_VAT,0),0)) AS RENTAL_RGST_COST_SPL --공급가액-등록비 ,SUM(DECODE(T1.RENTAL_TN,0,NVL(T1.RENTAL_RGST_COST_VAT,0),0)) AS RENTAL_RGST_COST_VAT --부가세-등록비 ,SUM(NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0)) AS NOM_SL_AMT --매출금액-렌탈료 ,SUM(NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0)) - SUM(NVL(T1.SL_SUM_VAT,0)) AS SPL_AMT --공급가액-렌탈료 ,SUM(NVL(T1.SL_SUM_VAT,0)) AS VAT --부가세-렌탈료 ,SUM(DECODE(T1.RENTAL_TN,0,NVL(T1.CNTR_AMT,0),0)) + SUM(NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0)) AS TOT_SL_AMT --매출금액-매출합계 ,(SUM(DECODE(T1.RENTAL_TN,0,NVL(T1.CNTR_AMT,0) - NVL(T1.RENTAL_RGST_COST_VAT,0),0))) + (SUM(NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0)) - SUM(NVL(T1.SL_SUM_VAT,0))) AS TOT_SPL --공급가액-매출합계 ,SUM(DECODE(T1.RENTAL_TN,0,NVL(T1.RENTAL_RGST_COST_VAT,0),0)) + SUM(NVL(T1.SL_SUM_VAT,0)) AS TOT_VAT --부가세-매출합계 FROM TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_MM_CL_IZ T1 INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T2 ON T1.PD_CD = T2.PD_CD /*원두제외*/ LEFT JOIN (SELECT /*+ USE_NL(SA B C) */ SA.CNTR_NO, SA.CNTR_SN, B.PD_CD, B.PD_NM, C.REF_PD_CLSF_VAL FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_PD_REL SA /*계약상품관계*/ , TB_PDBS_PD_BAS B /*상품기본*/ , TB_PDBS_PD_CLSF_BAS C /*상품분류기본*/ WHERE SA.BASE_PD_CD = B.PD_CD AND B.PD_CLSF_ID = C.PD_CLSF_ID AND C.REF_PD_CLSF_VAL IN ('05003002','0A003002') /*참조상품분류값 = 상품대분류2자리||상품중분류3자리||상품소분류3자리||상품세분류3자리*/ ) T7 ON T7.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T7.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN WHERE T1.SL_RCOG_DT BETWEEN #{baseDtFrom} AND #{baseDtTo} AND T1.SELL_TP_CD = #{sellTpCd}
AND T1.SELL_TP_DTL_CD = #{sellTpDtlCd}
AND T1.SELL_TP_DTL_CD IN ('21','23')
AND SUBSTR(SL_RCOG_DT,1,6) = T1.SL_CL_YM
AND T1.SELL_INFLW_CHNL_DTL_CD = #{sellChnlDvCd} /*판매채널*/
AND T1.SAP_PD_DV_CD = #{sapPdDvCd} --SAP상품구분코드
AND T7.CNTR_NO IS NULL AND T7.CNTR_SN IS NULL GROUP BY T1.SL_RCOG_DT, T1.SELL_TP_CD, T1.SELL_TP_DTL_CD,
T1.PD_CD, T2.PD_NM,
T1.SAP_PD_DV_CD
